'''Freeman's Announcement''' is a [[Quest Item]] obtained from a [[Huge Shell]] in the water southeast of [[Fort Charybdis Ruins]], [[Morte Region]], [[Fontaine]].

To obtain Freeman's treasure, light the unlit torch placed against the hull of [["The Rusty Rudder"]], and extinguish the torches next to [[Chambelland]], by the cave entrance and on the tavern's pier.

==Location==
<gallery>
Freeman's Announcement Map.png|Huge Shell's location
</gallery>

==Text==
[[File:Freeman's Announcement Clue.png|300px]]

He was once wrongly accused and, as he was about to be thrown into prison, saved by the selfless members of the press.<br>
Thanks to the honorable ladies' arguments, [[Freeman]] was freed.<br>
As his benefactor [[Euphrasie]] said:<br>
"Truth is always marching onward, and nothing can stop it."<br>
He has been continuing and waiting. Waiting for those who will carry on his ideals.

If you have read this far, friend, are you willing to believe in justice and hope?<br>
If you share those ideals, please light a flame.<br>
{{color|buzzword|Of the four flames, only that which is set upon the land is the flame of hope. Light it to receive a token of Freeman's gratitude.}}
